definition: hair/feather/down/wool/mildew/mold/coarse or semifinished/young/raw/careless/unthinking/nervous/scared/(of currency) to devalue or depreciate/classifier for Chinese fractional monetary unit ( = 角[jiao3] , = one-tenth of a yuan or 10 fen 分[fen1])
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)

sentences.english: The brushes have bristles of animal hair, with a very fine point.
sentences.chinese: 毛笔用动物的毛发制成，笔尖很细。

sentences.english: Long flowing locks, but his face and body hairless.
sentences.chinese: 一缕缕飘动的长发，但是脸部和身体却没有毛发。

sentences.english: In fact, now to the hair out-patient treatment, but also many young people.
sentences.chinese: 其实，现在来毛发门诊看病的，也多是年轻人。

sentences.english: Others change into nonliving parts of the hair and nails.
sentences.chinese: 其它细胞变成毛发，指甲等无生命部分。

sentences.english: Trichothiodystrophy is a rare hair disorder inherited in an autosomal recessive pattern.
sentences.chinese: 毛发缺硫性失养症为一少见的常染色体隐性毛发疾病。

sentences.english: Trichothiodystrophy is a rare hair disorder inherited in an autosomal recessive pattern.
sentences.chinese: 毛发缺硫性失养症为一少见的常染色体隐性毛发疾病。

sentences.english: A gel might work better for areas covered with hair, such as the scalp.
sentences.chinese: 胶类产品更适合同于有毛发的地方，如头皮处。

sentences.english: The coat on the rear of the thighs forms culottes , which should be as long as the ruff.
sentences.chinese: 后腿后面的毛发形成“裙裤”，毛发长度与脖圈一样。

sentences.english: The coat on the rear of the thighs forms culottes , which should be as long as the ruff.
sentences.chinese: 后腿后面的毛发形成“裙裤”，毛发长度与脖圈一样。

sentences.english: Its crisp-textured coat, a combination of hard and soft hairs, may be pepper- or mustard-coloured.
sentences.chinese: 身体毛发卷曲，软硬杂生，呈胡椒色或芥末色。

sentences.english: The texture is of medium harshness , not silky or wiry. Wavy or curly hair is a fault.
sentences.chinese: 毛发质地为中等粗硬，不应该呈丝状或刚毛状。

sentences.english: She leapt backwards, back arched and fur on end, tail held out stiffly.
sentences.chinese: 她向后一跃，脊背拱起，毛发竖立，尾巴僵直地伸着。

sentences.english: Head and forelimb of short hair.
a lock which stuck, drains clogged with my thick hair.
sentences.chinese: 一撮粘住的毛发，下水道被我浓密的头发堵住。

sentences.english: Hair insulates animals against the sun by day as well as against the cold by night.
sentences.chinese: 毛发使得动物可以在白天抵挡阳光，在夜晚抵挡严寒。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the therapeutic effect of hair autotransplantation.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察自体显微毛发移植治疗永久性秃发的效果。

definition: fur/down (soft fur)/villi capillary (in the small intestine)
white hair (of animals)/see also 白髮|白发[bai2 fa4]
to lose hair or feathers/to molt/depilation/to shave
